alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 8:26PM CDT until April 15 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Northern Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... East central Cross County in eastern Arkansas... Tipton County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Fayette County in west Tennessee... Southern Lauderdale County in west Tennessee... Western Haywood County in west Tennessee... Northern Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burdette to near Wilson to near Earle, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Brownsville, Millington, Covington, Ripley, Osceola, Marked Tree, Earle, Lepanto, Luxora, Wilson, Tyronza, Keiser, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Fort Pillow State Park, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Brighton and Joiner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Memphis.
